txt.en: Fear not my toothed smile nor scaly wings, I can help you complete the Epic quest series. If you complete this quest, you'll be flagged as having completed Book I of the Epic series.
'Alright, when you complete this quest you'll be flagged as having completed Book I of the Epic. Have fun!'
Level Up: Volume II: Book I (Brawler)
Completion of this quest will flag your character has having completed all the quests in Book I of the Epic quest series for Volume II.
